Containers.Name: OSRS-Adventurers-Log
Containers.Description: Pushes OSRS Hiscores changes to a webhook [br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/usr/src/app/accounts[/b] This is where the config json files are stored[br][br] [b]/usr/src/app/last[/b] This is where the last stats from the hiscores are stored[br][br]
